Need Help?

Frequently Asked Questions

WHAT IS HOSTING AND WHAT IS IT FOR?

In order for your website to be seen online, you need a web hosting service. Web hosting services differ by how the servers are set up (i.e. the space allocated) and the type of access that people (aka hosting customers) have to them. Every website you’ve ever visited has a website hoster. The main types of website hosting are Shared, Dedicated, VPS and Reseller.

WHAT IS SHARED HOSTING?

Shared Hosting is a type of web hosting where a single physical server hosts multiple websites. Considered the cheapest hosting plan, many users utilize the resources on a single server, which keeps the costs low. Users each get a section of that server where they can host their website files. Shared servers can host hundreds of users. Each customer who uses the Shared Hosting server has access to such features as databases, monthly traffic reports, disk space, email accounts, FTP accounts, and other add-ons offered by the hosting provider. System resources are shared on-demand by users on the server, where each one gets a percentage of everything from RAM and CPU as well as the single MySQL, Apache, and mail servers. Learn more about cheap hosting plans

WHAT IS WORDPRESS HOSTING?

Managed WordPress Hosting simply means that all technical aspects of running a WordPress website are taken care of (i.e. managed) by the web hosting provider. ZAMAN IT’s Managed WordPress Hosting, EasyWP, also features a user-friendly dashboard that allows you to update, manage, and back up all of your future installations. This means that you don’t have to figure out how to use a control panel (cPanel or Plesk) to manage your website. (As a friendly reminder, cPanel is a dashboard that is used to control your hosting environment.)

WHY SHOULD I USE EMAIL HOSTING FROM ZAMAN IT?

Although some web hosting providers offer free email, there’s often very few features and little-to-no support included. Private Email Hosting from ZAMAN IT, however, features a premium interface with way more flexibility and cloud power to manage all your communication—both personal and professional.

DOES ZAMAN IT PROVIDE AN UPTIME GUARANTEE FOR WEB HOSTING?

Whenever you purchase hosting from us, we offer you a monthly uptime guarantee. If for some reason we don’t deliver on this guarantee, which is determined by ZAMAN IT, you’ll be eligible for a prolonged service cycle—depending on your chosen web hosting plan. 

WHAT ZAMAN IT WEB HOSTING PLANS ARE SUITABLE FOR MY WORDPRESS WEBSITE?

All of our web hosting services, besides Email Hosting, work with your website. If you’re a beginner and you’re looking for the simplest way to host, we recommend EasyWP, which takes care of all the technical aspects, or Shared Hosting, which is one of the cheapest hosting plans and also features the free Website Builder tool. If you’re looking for web hosting that scales to your business needs, a VPS or Dedicated Server is the perfect website hoster choice.

WHICH TYPE OF WEB HOSTING IS BEST FOR ME?

If you’re not completely sure which type of hosting to go for, it might be a good idea to talk with our team. This will help to show you which hosting plan is best suited to your individual needs at this stage in your web project.

How ZAMAN IT Can Secure Your Website Hosting Bangladesh

In today’s digital era, website security is more critical than ever. For businesses and individuals in Bangladesh, choosing a secure web hosting provider is essential to protect sensitive data, ensure uninterrupted service, and maintain customer trust. ZAMAN IT, a leading website hosting Bangladesh, offers a range of advanced security features and practices designed to safeguard your website from potential threats. This comprehensive guide will explore how ZAMAN IT ensures the security of your website hosting Bangladesh and why it stands out in the industry.

1. Understanding the Importance of Website Security

Website security encompasses various practices and technologies aimed at protecting websites from cyber threats, including hacking, data breaches, malware, and DDoS (Distributed Denial of Service) attacks. A secure hosting environment is crucial for several reasons:

  • Data Protection: Safeguards sensitive data, such as customer information and financial transactions.
  • Maintaining Uptime: Prevents attacks that could disrupt your website’s availability.
  • Building Trust: Enhances your credibility and trustworthiness with users and search engines.
  • Compliance: Ensures adherence to regulatory requirements and industry standards.
2. Key Security Features Offered by ZAMAN IT

ZAMAN IT has implemented a suite of security features designed to protect your website from a wide range of threats. Here’s an overview of the key security measures they offer:

2.1 SSL Certificates

2.1.1 What is an SSL Certificate?

An SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) certificate encrypts the data exchanged between your website and its visitors. This encryption ensures that any information shared, such as login credentials and payment details, is secure from eavesdroppers.

2.1.2 ZAMAN IT’s SSL Offering

ZAMAN IT provides free SSL certificates with its hosting plans. This ensures that your website’s data is encrypted and that visitors see the padlock icon in their browser’s address bar, indicating a secure connection.

2.2 Regular Backups

2.2.1 Importance of Backups

Regular backups are vital for restoring your website to its previous state in case of data loss or corruption. This could be due to technical issues, accidental deletions, or cyber-attacks.

2.2.2 ZAMAN IT’s Backup Services

ZAMAN IT performs automated backups of your website data at regular intervals. This includes files, databases, and configurations. In the event of an issue, you can easily restore your site to a previous version, minimizing downtime and data loss.

2.3 Advanced Firewall Protection

2.3.1 What is a Firewall?

A firewall acts as a barrier between your website and potential threats from the internet. It monitors and filters incoming and outgoing traffic based on security rules.

2.3.2 ZAMAN IT’s Firewall Protection

ZAMAN IT employs advanced firewall technology to block malicious traffic and protect against common attacks, such as SQL injection and cross-site scripting (XSS). Their firewall settings are continuously updated to address new and evolving threats.

2.4 DDoS Protection

2.4.1 Understanding DDoS Attacks

DDoS attacks aim to overwhelm a website with excessive traffic, causing it to slow down or become unavailable. These attacks can disrupt service and negatively impact user experience.

2.4.2 ZAMAN IT’s DDoS Mitigation

ZAMAN IT integrates DDoS protection into their hosting infrastructure. This protection helps to identify and mitigate large-scale attacks, ensuring that your website remains operational even under heavy traffic conditions.

2.5 Malware Scanning and Removal

2.5.1 The Threat of Malware

Malware, including viruses and ransomware, can compromise your website’s security, steal sensitive information, or cause significant damage.

2.5.2 ZAMAN IT’s Malware Protection

ZAMAN IT provides regular malware scanning to detect and remove any malicious code or files from your website. Their security team actively monitors for signs of infection and takes prompt action to clean and secure your site.

2.6 Secure File Transfer Protocols

2.6.1 Importance of Secure File Transfers

When transferring files to and from your web server, using secure protocols is essential to prevent unauthorized access and data breaches.

2.6.2 ZAMAN IT’s Secure Protocols

ZAMAN IT supports secure file transfer protocols such as SFTP (Secure File Transfer Protocol) and FTPS (File Transfer Protocol Secure). These protocols encrypt data during transfer, adding an extra layer of protection.

2.7 Regular Security Updates and Patches

2.7.1 Keeping Software Updated

Outdated software, including CMS platforms, plugins, and server software, can be vulnerable to security exploits. Regular updates are essential to address known vulnerabilities.

2.7.2 ZAMAN IT’s Update Management

ZAMAN IT ensures that their server environments are regularly updated with the latest security patches and updates. This proactive approach helps to protect your website from known vulnerabilities and exploits.

3. How ZAMAN IT’s Security Practices Benefit You
3.1 Peace of Mind

By choosing ZAMAN IT, you can rest assured that your website is protected by state-of-the-art security measures. Their comprehensive approach to security minimizes the risk of breaches and ensures that your website remains safe and operational.

3.2 Enhanced User Trust

A secure website builds trust with your visitors. By implementing SSL certificates and other security features, ZAMAN IT helps you present a professional and trustworthy image to your audience.

3.3 Compliance with Regulations

For businesses that handle sensitive customer data, compliance with regulations such as GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) or PCI DSS (Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard) is crucial. ZAMAN IT’s security practices support compliance with these regulations, ensuring that your data handling processes are secure.

3.4 Rapid Recovery

In the event of a security incident, ZAMAN IT’s regular backups and efficient recovery processes ensure that you can quickly restore your website to a functional state, minimizing downtime and disruption.

4. Best Practices for Enhancing Your Website’s Security with ZAMAN IT
4.1 Utilize All Security Features

Make sure to take full advantage of all the security features offered by ZAMAN IT, including SSL certificates, firewall protection, and malware scanning. Implementing these features comprehensively will provide the highest level of security for your website.

4.2 Regularly Monitor Your Website

Regularly monitor your website for any unusual activity or signs of compromise. Utilize monitoring tools and services to keep an eye on performance and security.

4.3 Keep Your Website Software Updated

Ensure that your website’s CMS, plugins, and other software are always up-to-date. Regular updates help to patch known vulnerabilities and enhance overall security.

4.4 Educate Yourself and Your Team

Stay informed about the latest security threats and best practices. Educate yourself and your team on how to recognize and respond to potential security issues.

5. Future-Proofing Your Website’s Security
5.1 Emerging Threats

As technology evolves, so do cyber threats. ZAMAN IT remains vigilant and continuously updates its security measures to address new and emerging threats. Staying ahead of these threats is essential for maintaining the security of your website.

5.2 Investment in Security Technologies

ZAMAN IT invests in advanced security technologies and practices to provide cutting-edge protection. As new security technologies become available, ZAMAN IT integrates them into their hosting solutions to offer the best possible protection.

5.3 Local Expertise

With a deep understanding of the local digital landscape, ZAMAN IT can tailor its security practices to address specific regional challenges and threats. This localized expertise enhances the effectiveness of their security measures.

Website security is a critical aspect of maintaining a successful online presence. ZAMAN IT stands out as a premier choice for website hosting Bangladesh, offering a comprehensive range of security features and practices designed to protect your website from a variety of threats. With advanced security measures, including SSL certificates, regular backups, firewall protection, and malware scanning, ZAMAN IT ensures that your website remains secure and operational.

By choosing ZAMAN IT, you benefit from a robust security infrastructure that not only protects your data but also enhances user trust and supports regulatory compliance. Implementing best practices and staying informed about security developments will further strengthen your website’s defense against potential threats.

For secure and reliable website hosting Bangladesh, ZAMAN IT is the trusted partner you need. Explore their hosting solutions and experience the peace of mind that comes with knowing your website is in safe hands.
